name: Astro UX Design System
description:
The Astro Space UX Design System enables development teams to build rich space app experiences and custom applications with established interaction patterns and best practices. Using Astro to design your apps will help ensure that the Airmen and Guardians managing our space assets are using the most modern and consistent tools available.


https://www.astrouxds.com


Changelog

  • Color added to Status Tag background color
  • Fixed list-hover, table-hover
  • Changed placeholder text color to solid color
  • Status border colors updated opacity
  • Fixed Dialog Drop Shadows to match other effects
  • TIMELINE Increased spacing between timestamps and horizontal scrollbar
  • MONITORING ICONS - rearranged variant options of the Status property
  • CHECKBOX - fixed checkbox height
  • ACCORDION - fixed non-collapsing child element
  • TABLES - Release version 1.0
  • BANNER - New solid shades for icon colors
  • COLORS - Fixed incorrect label
  • Added status border color to global palette
  • DIALOG - added scrollbar element
  • EFFECTS - Fixed documentation values for Dialog Drop Shadows
